Question: Yale and August Home CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Yale and August Home

Connected by August Kit for Yale Assure Locks

- The Connected by August Kit for Yale Assure Locks allows existing Yale smart locks to be upgraded with August smarts via a new module
- The kit includes an August module, DoorSense sensor, and August Connect Wi-Fi Bridge
- The August module clips into the interior side of compatible Yale smart locks
- It provides features like Auto Unlock, remote locking and unlocking capability, and integration with Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, and Siri voice assistants
- The kit is compatible with Yale's Assure Lock SL Keyfree Touchscreen Deadbolt, Assure Lock Touchscreen Deadbolt, and Assure Lock Push Button deadbolt
- The kit is priced at $129 and includes the August module, DoorSense sensor, and August Connect Wi-Fi Bridge
- It is available for purchase on Yale's website, August.com, Amazon, Best Buy, and Lowe's

Yale Smart Outdoor Camera

- The Yale Smart Outdoor Camera is suitable for both indoor and outdoor use
- It features customizable detection zones, motion-triggered recordings, 154° field of view, enhanced color night vision, and a powerful spotlight and alarm sensor
- It is priced at £119.99
- It offers compatibility with the new Yale app for better monitoring and security

Yale Real Living Touchscreen Deadbolt

- The lock features an attractive capacitive touchscreen and can store up to 25 unique codes
- It integrates with multiple home automation platforms

August Home

Smart Lock and Smart Lock Pro

- The Smart Lock and Smart Lock Pro feature DoorSense, an intelligent sensor that can tell if the door is open or closed
- The Smart Lock Pro offers additional features such as one-touch entry, Bluetooth recognition, and NFC compatibility
Summary_cn:
耶鲁大学和August Home
通过August Kit for Yale Assure Locks连接在一起

- August Kit for Yale Assure Locks可以通过一个新的模块将现有的耶鲁智能锁升级为August智能锁
- 该套件包括August模块、DoorSense传感器和August Connect Wi-Fi桥接器
- August模块可以夹在适用的耶鲁智能锁的内侧
- 它提供自动解锁、远程锁定和解锁功能，并与Google助手、亚马逊Alexa和Siri语音助手集成
- 该套件适用于耶鲁的"Assure Lock SL Keyfree触摸屏死锁"、"Assure Lock触摸屏死锁"和"Assure Lock按键死锁"
- 该套件售价为129美元，包括August模块、DoorSense传感器和August Connect Wi-Fi桥接器
- 可在耶鲁网站、August.com、亚马逊、百思买和Lowe's购买

耶鲁智能户外摄像机

- 耶鲁智能户外摄像机适用于室内和室外使用
- 它具有可自定义的检测区域、运动触发录像、154°视野、增强的彩色夜视功能以及强大的聚光灯和警报传感器
- 售价为119.99英镑
- 它与新的耶鲁应用程序兼容，以实现更好的监控和安全性

耶鲁真实生活触摸屏死锁

- 这把锁具有吸引人的电容触摸屏，可以存储多达25个独特的代码
- 它可以与多个家庭自动化平台集成

August Home

智能锁和智能锁 Pro

- 智能锁和智能锁 Pro具有DoorSense，这是一个智能传感器，可以判断门是开着还是关着
- 智能锁 Pro还具有其他功能，如一键进入、蓝牙识别和NFC兼容性
